briefdescription.para: Attach device with IGenericSensor or IAnalogSensor interfaces Important assumptions here,.

listitem.para: Any generic sensor with 12 channels is a IMU sensor
Any generic sensor with 6 channels is a cartesian wrench sensor
Any analog sensor with 6 channels is a six axis force torque sensor
